article_title: People stunned by what Eleanor Holmes Norton told Hannity about Ferguson during an on-air hissy fit

og.description: Fox News host Sean Hannity had U.S. Rep. Eleanor Holmes Norton, D-D.C., on his show to discuss the recent grand jury decisions regarding Michael Brown and Eric Garner and the appearance quickly turned into a shout-fest. Norton readily acknowledged that she has not reviewed the transcripts of the grand jury testimony and other evidence, prompting …
og.title: People stunned by what Eleanor Holmes Norton told Hannity about Ferguson during an on-air hissy fit

article_summary:
#HandsUpDontShoot #Hannity — Sean Hannity (@seanhannity) December 5, 2014@seanhannity @EleanorNorton She should be removed from office.
— Ron Moss (@ron_ronaldmoss) December 5, 2014@seanhannity @EleanorNorton Just goes to show you what kind of ignorant morons are elected into high positions.
Fox News host Sean Hannity had U.S. Rep. Eleanor Holmes Norton, D-D.C., on his show to discuss the recent grand jury decisions regarding Michael Brown and Eric Garner and the appearance quickly turned into a shout-fest.
— Phillip McGuire (@PhillipCMcGuire) December 5, 2014@seanhannity @EleanorNorton Yeah, don’t let facts and logic get in the way of mythmaking.
Watch the exchange here via Fox News:“I haven’t read transcript because my interest is not in what happened,” says @EleanorNorton on #Ferguson case.
